leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 生信-序列分析与注释生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 采集/解析→QC→比对/组装→注释→评测→工作流

tools.name: Tibanna
tools.one_line_profile: AWS cloud execution manager for genomic pipelines (CWL/WDL/Snakemake)
tools.detailed_description: Tibanna is a software tool designed to execute genomic pipelines on Amazon Web Services (AWS). It supports major scientific workflow languages including CWL, WDL, and Snakemake, managing cloud infrastructure provisioning and job execution for high-throughput data analysis.

tools.name: EnsembleVariantCallingPipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Ensemble variant calling pipeline integrating Mutect2, Strelka2, Varscan2, and MuSE
tools.detailed_description: A genomic analysis pipeline that performs Single Nucleotide Variant (SNV) and Indel calling using an ensemble of four variant callers (Mutect2, Strelka2, Varscan2, MuSE). It processes FASTQ or BAM files to improve variant detection accuracy through consensus strategies.

tools.name: Post-QC
tools.one_line_profile: Post-variant calling quality control and phasing pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline designed for post-processing variant calls. It performs quality control steps to orient cohort data with reference files and includes modules for merging datasets and phasing variants against a reference panel.

tools.name: toil-rnaseq
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable RNA-seq analysis pipeline built on Toil
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive RNA-sequencing analysis pipeline developed by the UC Santa Cruz Computational Genomics Lab. It utilizes the Toil workflow engine to provide scalable, cross-platform execution of RNA-seq processing steps including alignment and quantification.

tools.name: toil-scripts
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of Toil-based workflows for genomic analysis
tools.detailed_description: A repository of genomic workflows implemented using the Toil workflow engine. It contains scripts for various common bioinformatics tasks, enabling reproducible and scalable analysis on different computing environments.

tools.name: iskylims
tools.one_line_profile: Laboratory Information Management System (LIMS) for NGS
tools.detailed_description: An open-source Laboratory Information Management System specifically designed for Next Generation Sequencing (NGS) facilities. It manages sample tracking, statistics, reporting, and bioinformatics analysis service workflows.

tools.name: cwl-airflow
tools.one_line_profile: Extension to run CWL workflows on Apache Airflow
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that extends Apache Airflow to support Common Workflow Language (CWL) v1.1. It allows scientists to execute portable CWL workflows using Airflow's scheduling and monitoring capabilities.

tools.name: LUSH-DNASeq-pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance DNA-Seq variant calling workflow
tools.detailed_description: A DNA sequencing analysis workflow designed for accuracy and speed. It utilizes the LUSH toolkit to perform variant calling on genomic data, optimized for high-throughput sequencing applications.

tools.name: cromwell-frontend
tools.one_line_profile: Web interface for the Cromwell workflow engine
tools.detailed_description: A web-based management interface for the Cromwell job server. It provides authentication and workflow definition management, enabling users to monitor and control scientific workflows running on Cromwell.

tools.name: Mulled
tools.one_line_profile: Automated container generation system for bioinformatics software
tools.detailed_description: A tool within the BioContainers ecosystem for automatically generating containerized versions (Docker/Singularity) of scientific software. It facilitates reproducibility by creating minimal, versioned containers for bioinformatics tools.

tools.name: CWL_HTS_pipelines
tools.one_line_profile: CWL workflows for High-Throughput Sequencing analysis
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Common Workflow Language (CWL) workflows and wrappers for processing High-Throughput Sequencing (HTS) data. It includes pipelines for RNA-Seq, ChIP-Seq, and Germline Variant calling.

tools.name: TCGAWorkflow
tools.one_line_profile: Bioconductor-based workflow for TCGA cancer data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive workflow for analyzing cancer genomics and epigenomics data from The Cancer Genome Atlas (TCGA). It leverages Bioconductor packages to provide an end-to-end analysis path for complex cancer datasets.

tools.name: CaPTk
tools.one_line_profile: Cancer Imaging Phenomics Toolkit for medical image analysis
tools.detailed_description: The Cancer Imaging Phenomics Toolkit (CaPTk) is a software platform for medical image analysis and predictive modeling. It integrates advanced algorithms for segmentation, feature extraction, and machine learning to support cancer research and radiomics.

tools.name: CDPHE-SARS-CoV-2
tools.one_line_profile: Workflows for SARS-CoV-2 genome assembly and analysis
tools.detailed_description: A set of bioinformatics workflows and scripts developed by the Colorado Department of Public Health and Environment for the assembly and analysis of SARS-CoV-2 whole genome tiled amplicon sequencing data.

tools.name: CalliNGS-NF
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipeline for GATK RNA-Seq variant calling
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline implementing the GATK Best Practices for variant calling from RNA-Seq data. It automates the process of read alignment, processing, and variant discovery using GATK tools.

tools.name: CebolaLab RNA-seq
tools.one_line_profile: Step-by-step RNA-seq analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A structured analysis pipeline for RNA-sequencing data, providing scripts and steps for processing raw reads into expression quantification and downstream analysis.

tools.name: ClarityNLP
tools.one_line_profile: NLP framework for clinical phenotyping and data extraction
tools.detailed_description: A Natural Language Processing (NLP) framework designed for extracting clinical phenotypes from medical notes. It supports OMOP data models and provides tools for query construction and document processing in a healthcare context.

tools.name: Consonance
tools.one_line_profile: Cloud infrastructure provisioner for scientific workflows
tools.detailed_description: A utility for scheduling, reporting on, and provisioning Virtual Machines (VMs) for scientific workflows. It is often used in conjunction with workflow managers to handle cloud resource allocation.

tools.name: wdl-ci
tools.one_line_profile: CI/CD tools for validating WDL workflows
tools.detailed_description: A set of tools designed to validate and test Workflow Description Language (WDL) repositories. It is intended for use in Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD) pipelines to ensure the reliability of scientific workflows.

tools.name: analysis_pipeline_WDL
tools.one_line_profile: WDL workflows for TOPMed GWAS analysis
tools.detailed_description: A collection of WDL workflows implementing the University of Washington TOPMed DCC Best Practices for Genome-Wide Association Studies (GWAS). It provides reproducible pipelines for large-scale genomic analysis.

tools.name: Toil
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable workflow engine for CWL, WDL, and Python pipelines
tools.detailed_description: A scalable, efficient, and cross-platform workflow engine that supports Common Workflow Language (CWL), Workflow Description Language (WDL), and Python-defined workflows. It enables the execution of complex scientific pipelines on various environments from local machines to the cloud.

tools.name: fold_tree
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake pipeline for phylogenetic tree construction
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake-based pipeline designed to create phylogenetic trees from sets of sequences. It automates the steps of sequence alignment and tree inference, facilitating reproducible phylogenomic analysis.

tools.name: GGR-cwl
tools.one_line_profile: CWL tools and workflows for Genomics of Gene Regulation
tools.detailed_description: A repository containing Common Workflow Language (CWL) tool definitions and workflows specifically for the Genomics of Gene Regulation (GGR) project. It enables reproducible analysis of gene regulation data.

tools.name: Calrissian
tools.one_line_profile: CWL workflow runner for Kubernetes
tools.detailed_description: A CWL runner designed to execute workflows on Kubernetes clusters. It provides a scalable way to run Common Workflow Language pipelines in containerized environments.

tools.name: ebi-metagenomics-cwl
tools.one_line_profile: CWL implementation of the EBI Metagenomics pipeline
tools.detailed_description: The Common Workflow Language (CWL) description of the analysis pipeline used by EBI Metagenomics. It allows users to reproduce the standard EBI metagenomic analysis locally or on other infrastructure.

tools.name: VIRify
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for detection of phages and eukaryotic viruses from metagenomic assemblies
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline designed to detect phages and eukaryotic viruses from metagenomic and metatranscriptomic assemblies, utilizing a curated database of viral HMMs.

tools.name: MGnify Pipeline v5.0
tools.one_line_profile: CWL descriptions of the MGnify metagenomics analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: The official Common Workflow Language (CWL) definitions for version 5.0 of the MGnify pipeline, used for the analysis of microbiome data.

tools.name: ENCORE
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for enhancing computational reproducibility in bioinformatics
tools.detailed_description: A framework or toolset designed to facilitate and enhance the computational reproducibility of bioinformatics analyses.

tools.name: Mikado
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight pipeline for identifying expressed loci from RNA-Seq data
tools.detailed_description: A Python pipeline that facilitates the identification of expressed loci from RNA-Seq data and selects the best gene models in each locus, integrating data from multiple transcript assemblers.

tools.name: REAT
tools.one_line_profile: Robust Eukaryotic Annotation Toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit designed to improve the robustness and accuracy of eukaryotic genome annotation processes.

tools.name: Caper
tools.one_line_profile: Python wrapper for Cromwell workflow manager
tools.detailed_description: A wrapper tool for the Cromwell workflow engine, designed to simplify the running of WDL workflows in various environments including cloud and HPC.

tools.name: Croo
tools.one_line_profile: Cromwell output organizer
tools.detailed_description: A utility to organize outputs from Cromwell workflow executions, making it easier to manage and interpret results from complex pipelines.

tools.name: ENCODE Long Read RNA Pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: WDL pipeline for processing long-read RNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: The official ENCODE pipeline for analyzing long-read RNA sequencing data, implemented in WDL.

tools.name: ENCODE Long RNA-Seq Pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: STAR-based pipeline for processing long RNA-Seq data
tools.detailed_description: The ENCODE consortium's standard processing pipeline for long RNA-Seq data, utilizing STAR for alignment.

tools.name: ESR Human Genomics Pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for human WGS/WES data processing
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow designed to process single samples or cohorts of Illumina paired-end sequencing data (WGS or WES) using standard tools like GATK4 and BWA.

tools.name: EdinburghGenomics Analysis Driver
tools.one_line_profile: Pipelines for Illumina sequencing QC and variant calling
tools.detailed_description: A set of pipelines used by Edinburgh Genomics for demultiplexing, sequence quality control, and variant calling on Illumina HiSeqX data.

tools.name: pytest-wdl
tools.one_line_profile: Pytest plugin for testing WDL workflows
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the pytest framework that enables testing of Workflow Description Language (WDL) scripts, facilitating test-driven development of bioinformatics pipelines.

tools.name: precisionFDA
tools.one_line_profile: Cloud platform for benchmarking NGS analysis pipelines
tools.detailed_description: A cloud-based platform by the FDA that provides an environment for the community to test, pilot, and benchmark new approaches to validating next-generation sequencing (NGS) analysis pipelines.

tools.name: FINNGEN regenie-pipelines
tools.one_line_profile: WDL pipelines for running Regenie analysis
tools.detailed_description: A collection of WDL pipelines designed to run Regenie, a tool for whole-genome regression modelling of large-scale genetic data.

tools.name: MAG Snakemake Workflow
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for recovery of prokaryotic genomes from metagenomes
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow for the recovery of prokaryotic genomes (Metagenome-Assembled Genomes, MAGs) from shotgun metagenomic sequencing data.

tools.name: Redundans
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for assembly of heterozygous/polymorphic genomes
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline designed to assist in the assembly of heterozygous or polymorphic genomes by reducing redundancy and scaffolding.

tools.name: GalSim
tools.one_line_profile: Modular galaxy image simulation toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A modular toolkit for simulating images of galaxies, used primarily for testing and calibrating astronomical measurement algorithms.

tools.name: MARS
tools.one_line_profile: Containerized approach to bioinformatics tool integration
tools.detailed_description: A framework for simplifying bioinformatics workflows through a containerized approach to tool integration and management.

tools.name: Eoulsan
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline and framework for NGS analysis
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline and framework dedicated to High Throughput Sequencing (HTS) data analysis, supporting RNA-seq and scRNA-seq workflows.

tools.name: sv-callers
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for detecting structural variants
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake-based workflow designed for the detection of structural variants in genomic data using multiple calling tools.

tools.name: SVsim
tools.one_line_profile: Synthetic Structural Variant generator for benchmarking
tools.detailed_description: A tool that generates synthetic Structural Variant calls to serve as benchmarks for testing and evaluating SV calling pipelines.

tools.name: Longbow
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for automating biosimulations on remote HPC
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to automate the submission and management of biomolecular simulations on remote High Performance Computing (HPC) resources.

tools.name: CLARITE
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for quality control and analysis of traits and exposures
tools.detailed_description: CLeaning to Analysis: Reproducibility-based Interface for Traits and Exposures. A Python package for cleaning and analyzing data from large-scale studies.

tools.name: dropSeqPipe
tools.one_line_profile: Single-cell RNA-seq pre-processing workflow
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow for the pre-processing of Single Cell RNA-Seq data, specifically designed for Drop-Seq data.

tools.name: sci-RNA-seq3 Pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Processing pipeline for sci-RNA-seq3 data
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts and pipelines for processing data from the sci-RNA-seq3 single-cell sequencing protocol.

tools.name: pytest-workflow
tools.one_line_profile: Test framework for bioinformatics workflows
tools.detailed_description: A tool to configure and run tests for workflows and pipelines using YAML configuration files, widely used in bioinformatics for ensuring pipeline reproducibility.

tools.name: ONT Assembly Snake
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for bacterial genome assembly using ONT data
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow designed for the assembly and polishing of bacterial genomes using Oxford Nanopore Technologies (ONT) sequencing data.

tools.name: LuigiNLP
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow system for Natural Language Processing
tools.detailed_description: A workflow system built on top of Luigi, specifically tailored for Natural Language Processing (NLP) tasks and pipelines.

tools.name: Colora
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for de novo genome assembly
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow for de novo genome assembly that produces chromosome-scale primary/phased assemblies and includes organelle assembly.

tools.name: GenoMAS
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-agent framework for automated scientific analysis workflows
tools.detailed_description: A minimalist multi-agent framework designed for the robust automation of scientific analysis workflows, specifically demonstrating capabilities in gene expression analysis.

tools.name: scPipe
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for single cell RNA-seq data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A preprocessing pipeline for single-cell RNA-seq data that handles raw reads to gene count matrices, including quality control and report generation.

tools.name: AWE
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow and resource management system for bioinformatics
tools.detailed_description: AWE (Analysis Workflow Engine) is a workload management system for bioinformatics data analysis, designed to manage scalable and reproducible workflows.

tools.name: Playbook-Workflow-Builder
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow builder for bioinformatics playbooks
tools.detailed_description: A tool developed by MaayanLab to construct and manage bioinformatics workflows, facilitating the creation of reproducible analysis playbooks.

tools.name: biojupies
tools.one_line_profile: Automated generation of bioinformatics Jupyter Notebooks
tools.detailed_description: A web-based tool that automatically generates tailored Jupyter Notebooks for bioinformatics analysis, enabling reproducible research and easy visualization.

tools.name: motrpac-rna-seq-pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Harmonized RNA-seq pipeline for MoTrPAC project
tools.detailed_description: A WDL-based RNA-seq data analysis pipeline developed for the Molecular Transducers of Physical Activity Consortium (MoTrPAC) to ensure harmonized data processing.

tools.name: bgcflow
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for biosynthetic gene cluster analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow designed for the systematic analysis of biosynthetic gene clusters (BGCs) across large collections of genomes (pangenomes).

tools.name: GenErode
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for genome erosion analysis in historical samples
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow for analyzing whole-genome sequencing data from historical and modern samples to study patterns of genome erosion.

tools.name: aMeta
tools.one_line_profile: Ancient microbiome analysis workflow
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow specifically designed for the analysis of ancient microbiome data, handling the specific characteristics of ancient DNA.

tools.name: ContainerInception
tools.one_line_profile: Wrapper for reproducible bioinformatics environments
tools.detailed_description: Gerber (Generalized Easy Reproducible Bioinformatics Environment wRapper) is a tool to facilitate the creation and usage of reproducible containerized environments for bioinformatics.

tools.name: gdc-dnaseq-cwl
tools.one_line_profile: GDC DNASeq analysis workflow in CWL
tools.detailed_description: The Common Workflow Language (CWL) implementation of the DNA-Seq analysis pipelines used by the NCI Genomic Data Commons (GDC).

tools.name: scriptcwl
tools.one_line_profile: Python library to create CWL workflows
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that allows users to create Common Workflow Language (CWL) workflows by writing simple Python scripts.

tools.name: Soft-Agar-Colony-Counter
tools.one_line_profile: Automated colony counting tool for soft agar assays
tools.detailed_description: A browser-based tool for hybrid automated/manual counting of colonies in soft agar colony formation assays, featuring live threshold tuning.

tools.name: seurigiotto-benchmark-framework
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark framework for Spatial Transcriptomics pipelines
tools.detailed_description: A framework designed for reproducible benchmarking of Spatial Transcriptomics (ST) data analysis pipelines, specifically comparing Seurat and Giotto.

tools.name: JAFFA
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for gene fusion detection
tools.detailed_description: A multi-step bioinformatics pipeline that detects gene fusions from RNA-Seq data, capable of using raw reads or pre-assembled transcripts.

tools.name: pgsc_calc
tools.one_line_profile: Polygenic Score Catalog Calculator pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline developed by the Polygenic Score Catalog to calculate polygenic scores (PGS) for input genomic data.

tools.name: janis
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to generate type-safe CWL and WDL workflows
tools.detailed_description: An open-source Python tool that allows for the machine generation of type-safe Common Workflow Language (CWL) and Workflow Description Language (WDL) workflows.

tools.name: HiFi-16S-workflow
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for PacBio HiFi 16S analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline specifically designed to analyze PacBio HiFi full-length 16S rRNA sequencing data for microbiome studies.

tools.name: HiFi-somatic-WDL
tools.one_line_profile: Tumor-normal variant calling workflow for HiFi reads
tools.detailed_description: A WDL workflow for performing tumor-normal variant calling using PacBio HiFi reads, optimized for somatic mutation detection.

tools.name: BENGAL
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for cross-species scRNA-seq integration
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline designed for the integration and assessment of single-cell RNA-seq datasets across different species.

tools.name: bionix
tools.one_line_profile: Reproducible bioinformatics pipelines using Nix
tools.detailed_description: A framework for building functional and highly reproducible bioinformatics pipelines using the Nix package manager.

tools.name: pypsa-eur
tools.one_line_profile: Optimization model of the European energy system
tools.detailed_description: A sector-coupled open optimization model of the European energy system, used for scientific modeling and planning of energy infrastructure.

tools.name: VesselExpress
tools.one_line_profile: Automated blood vasculature analysis tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the automated analysis of blood vasculature in 3D light-sheet image volumes, facilitating bioimage quantification.

tools.name: ro-crate-py
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for Research Object Crate (RO-Crate)
tools.detailed_description: A Python library to create and consume RO-Crates, a community standard for packaging research data and metadata to ensure reproducibility.

tools.name: HRIBO
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for bacterial Ribo-seq analysis
tools.detailed_description: A workflow for the reproducible and high-throughput analysis of bacterial Ribo-seq data, including pre-processing, QC, and ORF prediction.

tools.name: Capsule
tools.one_line_profile: Reproducibility framework for R and bioinformatics
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive framework designed to ensure the reproducibility of R-based bioinformatics workflows.

tools.name: qmflows
tools.one_line_profile: Library for computational chemistry workflows
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for constructing and executing efficient computational chemistry workflows, managing quantum mechanical calculations.

tools.name: reticulatus
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake pipeline for long-read genome assembly and polishing
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake-based bioinformatics pipeline designed for assembling and polishing long genomes using data from Oxford Nanopore Technologies (ONT). It automates the workflow of assembly and refinement for long-read sequencing data.

tools.name: Sentieon-WDL
tools.one_line_profile: WDL pipelines for Sentieon genomics tools
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Workflow Description Language (WDL) scripts for running Sentieon's genomics analysis tools. These pipelines facilitate high-performance variant calling and data processing compatible with Cromwell and other WDL executors.

tools.name: Variants2Neoantigen
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for neoantigen calling from variant records
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline that predicts tumor neoantigens starting from variant record files (MAF). It is designed to assist in immunogenomics research by identifying potential targets for cancer immunotherapy.

tools.name: ilus
tools.one_line_profile: WGS/WES variant calling pipeline generator using GATK and Sentieon
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight pipeline generator for Whole Genome Sequencing (WGS) and Whole Exome Sequencing (WES) data analysis. It integrates GATK and Sentieon tools to create efficient variant calling workflows.

tools.name: SingleRust
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance single-cell analysis tool written in Rust
tools.detailed_description: A single-cell analysis toolkit leveraging Rust's concurrency features to provide scalable and high-throughput processing pipelines for single-cell genomics data.

tools.name: Germline-StructuralV-nf
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipeline for germline structural variant calling
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline designed for calling germline structural variants from short-read Whole Genome Sequencing (WGS) datasets. It automates the process of SV detection to ensure reproducibility and scalability.

tools.name: ACES
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for querying small sequences in large genome sets
tools.detailed_description: ACES (Analysis of Conservation and Evolutionary Selection) is a workflow designed to query small sequences across a large set of genomes. It generates BLAST results, multiple sequence alignments, graphical fragment assemblies, and phylogenetic trees.

tools.name: EasyFuse
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for fusion gene detection from RNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline for the accurate detection of fusion genes using RNA-seq data. It streamlines the process of identifying gene fusions, which are critical in cancer genomics.

tools.name: covigator-ngs-pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipeline for SARS-CoV-2 variant calling
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for processing Next-Generation Sequencing (NGS) data of SARS-CoV-2. It handles steps from FASTQ to normalized and annotated VCFs using tools like GATK, BCFtools, LoFreq, and iVar.

tools.name: tronflow-mutect2
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipeline for Mutect2 somatic variant calling
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow implementation of the GATK Mutect2 somatic variant calling best practices. It provides a reproducible workflow for identifying somatic mutations in tumor-normal pairs or tumor-only samples.

tools.name: CloudNeo
tools.one_line_profile: CWL pipeline for patient-specific tumor neoantigen identification
tools.detailed_description: A Common Workflow Language (CWL) implementation of a cloud-native pipeline for identifying patient-specific tumor neoantigens. It is designed for scalability and reproducibility in immunogenomics analysis.

tools.name: nf-tenx
tools.one_line_profile: Containerized Nextflow pipelines for 10x Genomics data
tools.detailed_description: A collection of processing pipelines for 10x Genomics data, implemented in Nextflow and containerized for reproducibility. It consolidates various 10x workflows into a single repository.

tools.name: EarlGrey
tools.one_line_profile: Automated transposable element curation and annotation pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A fully automated pipeline for the curation and annotation of Transposable Elements (TEs) in eukaryotic genomes. It streamlines the identification and classification of repetitive elements.

tools.name: RNASeq
tools.one_line_profile: Perl-based RNA-seq analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive RNA-seq data analysis pipeline developed by UMCUGenetics. It handles the processing of RNA sequencing data for gene expression analysis.

tools.name: dv-trio
tools.one_line_profile: Trio variant calling pipeline using DeepVariant and GATK
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for calling variants in trio (father-mother-child) datasets. It utilizes DeepVariant for generating gVCFs, GATK for joint calling, and FamSeq for post-processing to eliminate Mendelian errors.

tools.name: snk
tools.one_line_profile: CLI generation tool for Snakemake workflows
tools.detailed_description: A tool that automatically generates Command Line Interfaces (CLIs) for Snakemake workflows. It enhances the usability and distribution of bioinformatics pipelines by creating user-friendly entry points.

tools.name: cLoops
tools.one_line_profile: Loop calling tool for 3D genomic data
tools.detailed_description: An accurate and flexible tool for identifying loops in 3D genomic data (such as ChIA-PET, Hi-C, or HiChIP). It helps in understanding chromatin organization and interactions.

tools.name: sailor
tools.one_line_profile: CWL and Singularity workflow for RNA editing detection
tools.detailed_description: A reproducible workflow for RNA editing detection, implemented using Common Workflow Language (CWL) and Singularity containers. It ensures consistent execution environments for RNA editing analysis.

tools.name: FreshWDL
tools.one_line_profile: JavaScript implementation of Workflow Description Language (WDL)
tools.detailed_description: A pure JavaScript library and toolset for the Workflow Description Language (WDL). It enables parsing and handling of WDL scripts in JavaScript environments, supporting the development of web-based workflow tools.

tools.name: HemTools
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of NGS pipelines and bioinformatic analyses
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive toolkit containing various Next-Generation Sequencing (NGS) pipelines and bioinformatic analysis scripts. It covers multiple aspects of genomic data processing.

tools.name: dadasnake
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for amplicon sequencing using DADA2
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow for analyzing amplicon sequencing data. It heavily utilizes DADA2 for accurate sample inference and provides a reproducible pipeline for microbiome studies.

tools.name: CliHelpParser
tools.one_line_profile: Generator for CWL schemas from CLI help output
tools.detailed_description: A utility that parses the output of Command Line Interface (CLI) help commands to automatically generate machine-readable schemas, such as Common Workflow Language (CWL) wrappers. This aids in wrapping bioinformatics tools for workflow systems.

tools.name: 16SMaRT
tools.one_line_profile: Reproducibility tool for 16S rRNA meta-analysis using mothur
tools.detailed_description: 16S rRNA Sequencing Meta-analysis Reproducibility Tool. It leverages 'mothur' to provide a reproducible workflow for meta-analyzing 16S rRNA sequencing data.

tools.name: cwl2wdl
tools.one_line_profile: Converter from CWL to WDL workflow languages
tools.detailed_description: A tool to convert Common Workflow Language (CWL) documents into Workflow Description Language (WDL) format. It facilitates interoperability between different bioinformatics workflow standards.

tools.name: ProteinFlow
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for processing protein structure data for deep learning
tools.detailed_description: A versatile computational pipeline designed to process protein structure data specifically for deep learning applications. It prepares datasets for training AI models on protein structures.

tools.name: pySCENIC
tools.one_line_profile: Python implementation of SCENIC for single-cell regulatory network inference
tools.detailed_description: A lightning-fast Python implementation of the SCENIC pipeline (Single-Cell rEgulatory Network Inference and Clustering). It enables the inference of transcription factors, gene regulatory networks, and cell types from single-cell RNA-seq data.

tools.name: kGWASflow
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for k-mers-based GWAS
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow for performing Genome-Wide Association Studies (GWAS) using k-mers. It provides a reference-free approach to association mapping.

tools.name: BindFlow
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for FEP and MM(PB/GB)SA calculations
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake-based automated workflow for performing Free Energy Perturbation (FEP) and MM(PB/GB)SA calculations using GROMACS. It streamlines molecular dynamics simulations for binding energy estimation.

tools.name: scispacy
tools.one_line_profile: Full spaCy pipeline and models for biomedical natural language processing
tools.detailed_description: A Python package containing spaCy models for processing biomedical, scientific or clinical text, enabling named entity recognition and other NLP tasks in the scientific domain.

tools.name: cromwell-client
tools.one_line_profile: Scala client for the Cromwell workflow engine

tools.name: pitagora-cwl
tools.one_line_profile: CWL tools and workflows by Pitagora-Network
tools.detailed_description: A repository of Common Workflow Language (CWL) tools and workflows developed by the Pitagora-Network for bioinformatics analysis.

tools.name: pytask
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow management system for reproducible data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A workflow management system that facilitates reproducible data analyses by automating the execution of tasks based on dependencies, similar to Make but designed for Python-based data science and research projects.

tools.name: R2DT
tools.one_line_profile: Visualise RNA secondary structure in standard layouts
tools.detailed_description: A tool to visualise RNA secondary structure in consistent, reproducible, and recognisable layouts, supporting a wide range of RNA types including rRNA, tRNA, and others.

tools.name: Benten
tools.one_line_profile: Language server for Common Workflow Language (CWL)
tools.detailed_description: A language server for Common Workflow Language (CWL) that provides code intelligence features like auto-completion and validation to assist in writing scientific workflow descriptions.

tools.name: Bunny
tools.one_line_profile: Executor for CWL workflows (Legacy)
tools.detailed_description: A legacy executor for Common Workflow Language (CWL) workflows, supporting sbg:draft-2 and CWL 1.0 standards for running bioinformatics pipelines.

tools.name: Rabix Composer
tools.one_line_profile: Visual and code editor for Common Workflow Language
tools.detailed_description: An integrated development environment for Common Workflow Language (CWL) that offers both visual and code editing capabilities to design and manage scientific workflows.

tools.name: cwl-svg
tools.one_line_profile: SVG visualization generator for CWL workflows
tools.detailed_description: A TypeScript library for generating interactive SVG visualizations of Common Workflow Language (CWL) workflows, aiding in the inspection and documentation of scientific pipelines.

tools.name: cwl-ts
tools.one_line_profile: TypeScript data model for Common Workflow Language
tools.detailed_description: A TypeScript library providing a data model for Common Workflow Language (CWL), enabling developers to parse, manipulate, and validate CWL documents programmatically.

tools.name: Rabix
tools.one_line_profile: Reproducible Analyses for Bioinformatics (Historical)
tools.detailed_description: A historical platform and execution engine designed to facilitate reproducible analyses in bioinformatics using the Common Workflow Language (CWL).

tools.name: SoapFilm3D
tools.one_line_profile: Simulation of soap films and foams using vortex sheets
tools.detailed_description: A C++ implementation for simulating double bubbles and soap films using discrete circulation-preserving vortex sheets, applicable in computational physics and fluid dynamics.

tools.name: REANA
tools.one_line_profile: Reusable research data analysis platform
tools.detailed_description: A platform for reproducible research data analysis, originally developed at CERN, allowing researchers to run containerized workflows on remote compute clouds.

tools.name: Refinery Platform
tools.one_line_profile: Data management and analysis system for bioinformatics
tools.detailed_description: A system for managing, analyzing, and visualizing bioinformatics data, integrating a data repository with a Galaxy-based workflow engine and visualization tools.

tools.name: What the Phage
tools.one_line_profile: Phage identification pipeline via Nextflow
tools.detailed_description: A reproducible Nextflow pipeline for bacteriophage identification and annotation from sequencing data, supporting Docker and Singularity containers.

tools.name: phylociraptor
tools.one_line_profile: Reproducible phylogenomic tree calculator
tools.detailed_description: A highly customizable Snakemake framework for reproducible phylogenomic inference, automating the process from orthology inference to tree reconstruction.

tools.name: Aviary
tools.one_line_profile: Hybrid assembly and MAG recovery pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A metagenomics pipeline for hybrid assembly and Metagenome-Assembled Genome (MAG) recovery, integrating various bioinformatics tools for microbial genomics.

tools.name: law
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale task workflow management for HEP
tools.detailed_description: A Python package extending Luigi to build large-scale task workflows, featuring remote target handling and environment sandboxing, widely used in High Energy Physics (HEP).

tools.name: ProcaryaSV
tools.one_line_profile: Ensemble structural variant calling pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake-based pipeline for structural variant (SV) and copy number variant (CNV) calling in prokaryotes using an ensemble of multiple callers.

tools.name: nf-repeatmasking
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow workflow for repeat detection and masking
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline designed for automatic detection, classification, and masking of repetitive elements in genomic sequences.

tools.name: UCSCXenaTools
tools.one_line_profile: R package for accessing UCSC Xena genomics data
tools.detailed_description: An R package that provides an interface to access and analyze functional genomics data from the UCSC Xena platform, covering multi-omics and single-cell RNA-seq data.

tools.name: nano-rave
tools.one_line_profile: Rapid onsite QC and variant calling for Nanopore data
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline designed for rapid quality control and variant calling of Oxford Nanopore sequencing data, suitable for pathogen surveillance.

tools.name: sanger-tol/blobtoolkit
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipeline for BlobToolKit analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow DSL2 pipeline used by the Sanger Tree of Life project to generate data for BlobToolKit, aiding in the identification of contamination and assembly assessment.

tools.name: sanger-tol/genomeassembly
tools.one_line_profile: Tree of Life genome assembly workflows
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of genome assembly workflows for the Sanger Tree of Life project, orchestrating various assembly tools via Nextflow.

tools.name: sanger-tol/genomenote
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline to generate Genome Notes and metrics
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline that collates assembly statistics, quality metrics, and Hi-C contact maps to generate a 'Genome Note' for published assemblies.

tools.name: sanger-tol/readmapping
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for aligning reads to genome assembly
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow DSL2 pipeline for aligning short and long sequencing reads to a reference genome assembly, part of the Sanger Tree of Life production suite.

tools.name: rna-seq-pop
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for population genomics from RNA-Seq
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow designed to extract population genomic signals (such as variants) from Illumina RNA-sequencing data.

tools.name: Sapporo
tools.one_line_profile: GA4GH Workflow Execution Service (WES) implementation
tools.detailed_description: A standard implementation of the GA4GH Workflow Execution Service (WES) API, allowing for the management and execution of scientific workflows (CWL, WDL, Nextflow) via a standardized interface.

tools.name: Sapporo Service
tools.one_line_profile: Web application for GA4GH WES
tools.detailed_description: The service component of the Sapporo WES implementation, providing the API endpoints and execution logic for running genomic workflows.

tools.name: sevenbridges-cwl
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for CWL workflow generation
tools.detailed_description: A Python library developed by Seven Bridges for programmatically generating and managing Common Workflow Language (CWL) workflow descriptions.

tools.name: sevenbridges-r
tools.one_line_profile: Seven Bridges API Client and CWL SDK in R
tools.detailed_description: An R package providing an API client for the Seven Bridges Platform and tools for handling CWL schemas, enabling R users to interact with cloud genomics workflows.

tools.name: TractoFlow
tools.one_line_profile: Diffusion MRI pipeline leveraging Nextflow
tools.detailed_description: A robust and efficient diffusion MRI processing pipeline built with Nextflow and Singularity, handling steps from raw data to tractography.

tools.name: SciPipe
tools.one_line_profile: Scientific workflow library for Go
tools.detailed_description: A workflow library for writing complex and dynamic scientific pipelines in the Go programming language, emphasizing resource efficiency and flexibility.

tools.name: PyDESeq2
tools.one_line_profile: Python implementation of DESeq2 for RNA-seq
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the popular DESeq2 method for differential expression analysis of bulk RNA-seq data, bringing this statistical method to the Python ecosystem.

tools.name: zUMIs
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline to process RNA-seq data with UMIs
tools.detailed_description: A fast and flexible pipeline for processing RNA-sequencing data containing Unique Molecular Identifiers (UMIs), handling filtering, mapping, and counting.

tools.name: wdlRunR
tools.one_line_profile: Run WDL workflows from R
tools.detailed_description: An R package that facilitates the execution of Workflow Description Language (WDL) workflows, enabling genomic data science within the R environment backed by cloud resources.

tools.name: Nextflow Tower
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source core for the Nextflow Tower workflow management platform
tools.detailed_description: Nextflow Tower is a platform for the monitoring, logging, and management of Nextflow pipelines. This repository contains the open-source components enabling the orchestration of scientific workflows.

tools.name: Sequana
tools.one_line_profile: A set of Snakemake NGS pipelines and reporting tools
tools.detailed_description: Sequana provides a collection of Snakemake pipelines for various NGS applications (e.g., RNA-seq, variant calling) along with tools for generating HTML reports and handling configuration.

tools.name: Hecatomb
tools.one_line_profile: Virome analysis pipeline for Illumina sequence data
tools.detailed_description: Hecatomb is a bioinformatics pipeline designed for the analysis of viral metagenomes from Illumina sequencing data, handling quality control, assembly, and taxonomic assignment.

tools.name: Long-Read-Proteogenomics
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for protein isoform detection via long-read RNA-seq and MS
tools.detailed_description: A specialized workflow that integrates long-read RNA-seq data with mass spectrometry-based proteomics to enhance the detection and characterization of protein isoforms.

tools.name: CeleScope
tools.one_line_profile: Single cell analysis pipelines for Singleron data
tools.detailed_description: CeleScope contains a collection of bioinformatics pipelines specifically designed for processing and analyzing single-cell sequencing data generated by Singleron platforms.

tools.name: snakefiles
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of Snakemake workflows for RNA-seq analysis
tools.detailed_description: A repository providing reusable Snakemake workflow definitions (Snakefiles) for common RNA-seq data analysis tasks, including alignment with STAR and quantification with Kallisto.

tools.name: dna-seq-gatk-variant-calling
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake pipeline implementing GATK best-practices
tools.detailed_description: A standardized Snakemake workflow that implements the GATK best-practices for DNA-seq variant calling, ensuring reproducible germline variant detection.

tools.name: dna-seq-varlociraptor
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for variant calling using Varlociraptor
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow designed for calling small and structural variants across various scenarios (tumor/normal, pedigree, etc.) using the Varlociraptor statistical model.

tools.name: rna-seq-kallisto-sleuth
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for RNA-seq DE analysis with Kallisto and Sleuth
tools.detailed_description: A reproducible Snakemake workflow for performing differential expression analysis on RNA-seq data, utilizing Kallisto for pseudo-alignment and Sleuth for statistical analysis.

tools.name: rna-seq-star-deseq2
tools.one_line_profile: RNA-seq workflow using STAR and DESeq2
tools.detailed_description: A standard Snakemake workflow for RNA-seq analysis that performs alignment using STAR and differential expression analysis using DESeq2.

tools.name: Snakemake
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow management system for reproducible data analysis
tools.detailed_description: Snakemake is a workflow management system that aims to reduce the complexity of creating workflows by providing a fast and comfortable execution environment, together with a clean and modern specification language in Python.

tools.name: Snakemake Wrappers
tools.one_line_profile: Repository of reusable wrappers for Snakemake rules
tools.detailed_description: The Snakemake Wrapper Repository provides a collection of pre-defined wrappers for common bioinformatics tools, allowing them to be easily integrated into Snakemake workflows without writing boilerplate code.

tools.name: snek5000
tools.one_line_profile: Python framework for Nek5000 CFD simulations
tools.detailed_description: A Python framework designed to facilitate the setup, execution, and post-processing of Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD) simulations using the Nek5000 spectral element code.

tools.name: mapache
tools.one_line_profile: Mapping pipeline for ancient DNA
tools.detailed_description: Mapache is a specialized pipeline for processing ancient DNA (aDNA) sequencing data, handling the specific characteristics of degraded DNA during mapping and analysis.

tools.name: Bpipe
tools.one_line_profile: Platform for running and managing bioinformatics pipelines
tools.detailed_description: Bpipe is a dedicated workflow tool for bioinformatics that emphasizes simplicity and readability of pipeline definitions, managing parallelism and job scheduling.

tools.name: GotCloud
tools.one_line_profile: Cloud-based mapping and variant calling pipelines
tools.detailed_description: GotCloud (Genomes on the Cloud) provides a set of pipelines for aligning sequence data and calling variants, optimized for cloud environments and large-scale sequencing projects.

tools.name: TOPMed Freeze 3 Pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Variant calling pipeline for TOPMed Freeze 3
tools.detailed_description: The variant calling pipeline used for the TOPMed (Trans-Omics for Precision Medicine) Freeze 3 data release, handling large-scale whole-genome sequencing data.

tools.name: Steep
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow Management System for scientific workflows in the Cloud
tools.detailed_description: Steep is a workflow management system specifically designed to execute scientific workflows in cloud environments, handling task orchestration and resource management.

tools.name: Sprocket
tools.one_line_profile: Bioinformatics workflow engine for WDL
tools.detailed_description: Sprocket is a workflow engine built in Rust that executes bioinformatics pipelines defined in the Workflow Description Language (WDL).

tools.name: wdl (Rust)
tools.one_line_profile: Rust library for parsing and working with WDL documents
tools.detailed_description: A Rust crate providing functionality to parse, validate, and manipulate Workflow Description Language (WDL) documents, serving as a building block for WDL-based scientific tools.

tools.name: St. Jude Cloud Workflows
tools.one_line_profile: Bioinformatics workflows for St. Jude Cloud
tools.detailed_description: A collection of WDL-based bioinformatics workflows developed for and used within the St. Jude Cloud ecosystem for analyzing genomic data.

tools.name: Sunbeam
tools.one_line_profile: Extensible metagenomics pipeline
tools.detailed_description: Sunbeam is a robust and extensible pipeline for metagenomic sequencing analysis, designed to be easy to install and use while allowing for custom extensions.

tools.name: easyRNAseqDE
tools.one_line_profile: R package for RNAseq differential expression analysis
tools.detailed_description: An R package that simplifies the process of RNA-seq differential expression analysis and visualization, promoting reproducibility in transcriptomic studies.

tools.name: systemPipeShiny
tools.one_line_profile: Shiny-based web interface for systemPipeR workflow management
tools.detailed_description: A Shiny framework designed for workflow management and data visualization, specifically acting as a graphical interface for the systemPipeR bioinformatics workflow environment.

tools.name: bio-pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of lightweight bioinformatics analysis pipelines
tools.detailed_description: A collection of bioinformatics analysis pipelines and scripts for specific tasks, maintained by Haibao Tang (author of JCVI/GOATOOLS).

tools.name: lobster-local
tools.one_line_profile: AI coding assistant specifically for bioinformatics
tools.detailed_description: A tool described as 'Claude-Code for Bioinformatics', designed to assist in generating or managing bioinformatics code and workflows locally.

tools.name: public_health_bioinformatics
tools.one_line_profile: WDL workflows for public health pathogen genomics
tools.detailed_description: Bioinformatics workflows written in WDL for genomic characterization, submission preparation, and genomic epidemiology of pathogens of public health concern.

tools.name: public_health_viral_genomics
tools.one_line_profile: Viral genomics workflows for public health (SARS-CoV-2)
tools.detailed_description: Bioinformatics workflows for genomic characterization and epidemiology of viral pathogens, with a focus on SARS-CoV-2, written in WDL.

tools.name: scib-pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake pipeline for single-cell integration benchmarking
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake pipeline that works with the scIB package to benchmark data integration methods for single-cell data.

tools.name: ngs-pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Somatic variant calling pipeline for WES/WGS
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline designed for Somatic Variant Calling using Whole Exome Sequencing (WES) and Whole Genome Sequencing (WGS) data.

tools.name: paperboy
tools.one_line_profile: Scheduler and report generator for Jupyter Notebooks
tools.detailed_description: A web frontend and backend for scheduling Jupyter notebook execution and generating reports, facilitating reproducible data science workflows.

tools.name: ep3
tools.one_line_profile: Pluggable workflow engine for CWL
tools.detailed_description: A workflow engine for Common Workflow Language (CWL) that aims to have a pluggable architecture for executing bioinformatics workflows.

tools.name: RNAseq-workflow
tools.one_line_profile: Setup and scripts for RNA-seq analysis workflow
tools.detailed_description: A repository providing scripts and instructions for setting up and running a standard RNA-seq analysis workflow.

tools.name: UGENE
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated bioinformatics software suite
tools.detailed_description: A free open-source cross-platform bioinformatics software suite that integrates various tools for sequence analysis, alignment, and workflow management.

tools.name: cwl-ica
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of CWL workflows for Illumina Connected Analytics
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Common Workflow Language (CWL) workflows designed for use with Illumina Connected Analytics (ICA).

tools.name: unionbio
tools.one_line_profile: Bioinformatics tasks and workflows for Flyte/Union
tools.detailed_description: Robust and ready-to-use tasks and workflows for bioinformatics pipelines (e.g., variant calling, protein folding) orchestrated using Flyte and Union.

tools.name: pyrpipe
tools.one_line_profile: Python framework for reproducible bioinformatics pipelines
tools.detailed_description: A python package to create reproducible bioinformatics pipelines by allowing easy import and execution of Unix tools/commands within Python.

tools.name: seq2science
tools.one_line_profile: Automated preprocessing workflows for NGS data
tools.detailed_description: A tool for automated and customizable preprocessing of Next-Generation Sequencing data, supporting ATAC-seq, ChIP-seq, and RNA-seq workflows.

tools.name: toil-vg
tools.one_line_profile: Distributed computing framework for variation graphs (vg)
tools.detailed_description: A framework based on Toil for running variation graph (vg) workflows at scale in distributed and cloud environments.

tools.name: vg_wdl
tools.one_line_profile: WDL workflows for variation graph analysis
tools.detailed_description: Workflow Description Language (WDL) scripts for common variation graph (vg) workflows, facilitating pangenomic analysis.

tools.name: vsn-pipelines
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipelines for single-cell data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A repository of pipelines for single-cell data analysis implemented in Nextflow DSL2, maintained by VIB-Single Cell Core.

tools.name: scATAC-pro
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive tool for scATAC-seq data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive tool for processing, analyzing, and visualizing single-cell chromatin accessibility sequencing (scATAC-seq) data.

tools.name: nano-snakemake
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake pipeline for Nanopore SV analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake pipeline designed for Structural Variant (SV) analysis from Oxford Nanopore genome sequencing data.

tools.name: dviont
tools.one_line_profile: Variant calling pipeline for Q20+ ONT long-reads
tools.detailed_description: A variant calling pipeline specifically designed for high-quality (Q20+) Oxford Nanopore Technologies (ONT) long-read sequencing data.

tools.name: flo
tools.one_line_profile: Same-species annotation lift-over pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for lifting over genome annotations between assemblies of the same species.

tools.name: analysis-wdls
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable genomic analysis pipelines in WDL
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scalable genomic analysis pipelines written in Workflow Description Language (WDL), maintained by WUSTL Oncology.

tools.name: RNA-seq-bioinformatics
tools.one_line_profile: Automated RNA-seq bioinformatics pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A preliminary attempt at complete automation of bioinformatics workflows for RNA-seq data analysis.

tools.name: rnaseqlib
tools.one_line_profile: Library and pipeline for RNA-Seq analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python library and pipeline for RNA-Seq analysis, including MISO integration.

tools.name: choppy-pipe
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated analysis platform for computational reproducibility
tools.detailed_description: An integrated analysis platform designed to efficiently achieve computational reproducibility in bioinformatics workflows.

tools.name: cwlexec
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to run CWL workflows on LSF clusters
tools.detailed_description: An open source tool designed to execute Common Workflow Language (CWL) workflows on LSF (Load Sharing Facility) clusters.

tools.name: VIRTUS
tools.one_line_profile: Viral transcriptome detection and quantification pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline for detecting and quantifying viral transcriptomes, with specific consideration for splicing events.

tools.name: zarp
tools.one_line_profile: Zavolab Automated RNA-seq Pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A user-friendly and automated RNA-seq analysis pipeline developed by Zavolab, handling preprocessing and quantification.
